doc.previous: Computers have been used to assist hydrostatic calculations such as determining displacement since the 1950s These were originally manual similar to slide rules which could convert cargo levels to values such as deadweight tonnage draft and trim Digital computers employ programs to make the calculations 7
doc.after: A variety of terms are used to describe varying degrees of displacement under specific loads
